item.title: The whale that accumulated ETH in January and May this year liquidated its position during this round of price drop, realizing a profit of $19.64 million.
item.description: On August 15th, according to Ashes Monitor, a whale offloaded their holdings of 9,109.6 ETH in the early hours of today to take profits, raking in $19.64 million and nearly doubling their investment.They had acquired these ETH in January and May of this year, spending a total of $21.52 million at an average price of $2,363. After the drop last night, they sold their holdings this morning at a price of $4,519, realizing $41.16 million.

item.title: Announcement: SEC Chair to Speak on Project Crypto Tonight at 8:30 PM
item.description: On August 15th, the Chairman of the US SEC, Paul Atkins, will give a speech on Project Crypto this evening at 8:30 PM Beijing time. On August 1st, the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) announced the launch of the Project Crypto initiative, with the aim of promoting the modernization of securities regulations and enabling the digitization of the US financial markets.

item.title: Two Whale Addresses Continuously Buy the Dip in Ethereum During the Dip, Accumulating Over $150 Million
item.description: On August 15th, as per Arkham's monitoring, two significant cryptocurrency holders (whales) made purchases this morning. 0x1e0 acquired $1.182 billion worth of ETH from FalconX, while 0xa3A purchased $40.5 million worth of ETH from Galaxy Digital OTC.

item.title: Ethereum Layer 2 project SKALE sees a nearly 150% surge in two weeks after announcing the launch of FAIR, a blockchain project aiming to eliminate MEV.
item.description: On August 15th, according to HTX market data, the Ethereum Layer 2 project SKALE has witnessed a nearly 150% surge in the past two weeks and is currently trading at $0.049.Regarding the news front, SKALE announced in June that it will launch the blockchain project FAIR, with the aim of eliminating MEV from the consensus layer. This project is specifically designed for the next generation of DeFi and AI.

item.title: A hacker panic-sold 4958 ETH during a market dip.
item.description: On August 15th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, the hacker "0x17E0" engaged in panic-selling of 4958 ETH ($22.13 million) during the 5-hour market dip that occurred earlier. The selling price was $4463, resulting in a locked-in profit of $9.75 million.

item.title: Yesterday, the PEPE Whale opened a position once again, purchasing $1.21 million worth of PEPE.
item.description: On August 15th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), yesterday the new address 0x122...002bA, which initially took a position in PEPE, seemed to have increased its position in the early hours.During the past 10 hours, it has once again withdrawn 1.078 billion PEPE from Coinbase, with a value of $1.21 million. Currently, the holder owns a total of 2.186 billion PEPE. Based on the withdrawal price, the average cost is approximately $0.00001173, resulting in an unrealized loss of $140,000.

item.title: Federal Reserve Chair to Deliver Speech on the 22nd, Market Focused on Rate Cut Expectations and Succession Plan Issues
item.description: August 15th. Based on the schedule of the Federal Reserve, Federal Reserve Chairman Powell is scheduled to deliver a speech on the economic outlook and the evaluation of the Federal Reserve's policy framework at the annual central bank meeting of the Kansas City Fed in Jackson Hole, Wyoming on August 22nd at 10 a.m. Eastern Time (10 p.m. Beijing Time).This speech arrives at a crucial time: recent data indicates that tariff measures have had a certain impact on inflation, while the labor market is showing a slowdown. This complex situation has enhanced the market's expectation that the Federal Reserve may announce a 25-basis-point rate cut at the next month's meeting. Meanwhile, U.S. President Trump continues to put pressure for a rate cut and is seeking a replacement. Powell's term as Federal Reserve Chairman will expire in May next year. (FXStreet)

item.title: Hyperliquid's yesterday fee and revenue both hit an all-time high.
item.description: On August 15th, based on DefiLlama data, the fees and revenue of Hyperliquid reached $7.48 million and $6.96 million respectively yesterday, both reaching new all-time highs.Furthermore, according to Hyperliquid News data, the Hyperliquid Rescue Fund repurchased more than $8 million worth of HYPE within the past 24 hours, also setting a new record high.

item.title: Former Goldman Sachs Executive Joins Mysten Labs as Chief Capital Markets Officer
item.description: August 15th. As per official information, Mysten Labs declared that Mustafa Al Niama, who was formerly the head of the digital assets department at Goldman Sachs Americas, will act as the Capital Markets Lead. He will be responsible for overseeing the expansion of Sui in the institutional market and expediting on-chain financial innovation.

item.title: Four-Time Scalper 100% Win Rate Smart Money bought 2,174.02 WETH in the early hours today
item.description: August 15th. According to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai9684xtpa), a shrewd whale that achieved a 100% success rate in a specific four-timeframe ETH pattern purchased 2,174.02 WETH early this morning at a cost of $4,599.77. Meanwhile, they set a limit sell order at $4,655 with the intention of making a profit of $120,000 if the order is executed.
